name: HOTMESS Radio Trigger
description: Triggers from QR, Telegram, or schedule to pull music, inject stinger/VO, push to RadioKing, and log.

modules.name: Trigger
modules.description: Starts when user scans QR, sends Telegram message, or at scheduled time.

modules.name: Fetch Music
modules.description: Calls SoundCloud or Spotify API to retrieve track by mood tag or time slot.

modules.name: Stinger/VO Selection
modules.description: Chooses a stinger or VO file based on context (e.g. /confess = Stewart Who, late = 3Day drop).

modules.name: FTP Upload
modules.description: Pushes final MP3 into RadioKing auto-DJ folder via FTP.

modules.name: Logger
modules.description: Logs the trigger, track used, stinger applied, timestamp, and outcome.

modules.name: Telegram Reply
modules.description: Sends confirmation and affiliate/care message to user.
